name: AnderssonKev's Chicken Game
description:
This is a small test project (in 3 weeks) where I wanted to learn how to do a 3D platformer controller. Please let me know what you think!

Time stops when all orbs are collected if you want to see how fast you were!

Livestreaming the development over at AnderssonKev Twitch

Controls

  • Left Joystick / WASD - Move character
  • Right Joystick / Mouse - Rotate camera
  • A / Space - Jump / Double Jump
  • X / Left Mouse - Spin attack
  • B / Shift - Sprint / Dive in air
  • Y - Buk! Buk!
  • RT -  In air for dive attack

If you want then you can follow me on Twitter as well.
